dmca.title: NetResult DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs,

We write on behalf of the Amaury Sports Organisation (ASO) who own and
control all rights associated with the conduct, promotion and management of
the Tour de France, including but not limited to, all related intellectual
property, broadcast and footage rights worldwide.  We have been authorised
by ASO to send this letter to you on their behalf.  

 

We have contacted to Goole via "Report alleged copyright infringement:
Android Market" form, emails and regarding the infringing Application you
provide, 

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.appmakr.app230955
<https://market.android.com/details?id=com.appmakr.app230955&feature=search_
result> &feature=search_result,

https://market.android.com/details?id=marvin.toolbox.letour
<https://market.android.com/details?id=marvin.toolbox.letour&feature=search_
result> &feature=search_result, 

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.kjasoft.tourdefrance
<https://market.android.com/details?id=com.kjasoft.tourdefrance&feature=sear
ch_result> &feature=search_result,

https://market.android.com/details?id=eu.hultink.tour11
<https://market.android.com/details?id=eu.hultink.tour11&feature=search_resu
lt> &feature=search_result,

https://market.android.com/details?id=com.oslwp.letour
<https://market.android.com/details?id=com.oslwp.letour&feature=search_resul
t> &feature=search_result,

 

 

Those application contains that Tour de France logo, Trademark, and word
trademark

 

We have also contacted to the developers, but no responses so far.  

 

Those contents are infringing our clients rights, 

 

Please take an immediate action. 

Yours faithfully,

 

[redacted]

 

NetResult Solutions Limited

PO BOX 68506

London

SW15 9DT

United Kingdom

+44 (0)20 8246 4123

 

 

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------

 

Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please 

accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail 

immediately to the correct person or department for action.

 

This email and any attachments thereto may contain private, 

confidential, and privileged material for the sole use of the individual 

or entity to whom they are addressed. If you are not the intended 

recipient, be advised that you have received this email in error and 

that any use, dissemination, forwarding, printing or copying of this 

email is strictly prohibited. If you have received this message in 

error, please immediately return this by e-mail and then delete it.

 

Although this email message has been scanned for the presence of 

computer viruses, the sender accepts no liability for any damage 

sustained as a result of a computer virus and it is the recipient's 

responsibility to ensure that this email is virus free.

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------

 

 

 



NetResult

 

 



[redacted]
Account Executive


 <mailto:chihok@nr-online.com> ChihoK@nr-online.com
 <http://www.nr-online.com/> http://www.nr-online.com 

NetResult
PO Box 68506
London
SW15 9DT


Tel: +44 (0)20 8246 4120

















This email and any attachments thereto may contain private, confidential,
and privileged material for the sole use of the individual or entity to whom
they are addressed. If you are not the intended recipient, be advised that
you have received this email in error and that any use, dissemination,
forwarding, printing or copying of this email is strictly prohibited. If you
